effect.sun_moon: Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage. Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected. rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage. Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected. rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage. Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected. rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.

short_effect.sun_moon: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents’ Speed by one stage upon switching in.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents’ Speed by one stage upon switching in.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents’ Speed by one stage upon switching in.

flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.
flavor_text.sun_moon: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.
